HERO_SMALL: MORE THAN 300 INVESTORS TRUST OUR AUTOMATED SOLUTIONS.
HERO_H1: Boost your investments with cutting-edge technology.
HERO_H2: We offer automated trading bots that execute trades with precision, efficiency and discipline, helping you achieve your goals and objectives, with total financial freedom.

WELCOME.PARRAGRAPH1: Welcome to Inventek Investment Group, your trusted partner in automated trading. We are dedicated to empowering traders and investors with advanced trading bots that leverage technology to enhance your trading experience and potential profitability.
WELCOME.PARRAGRAPH2: At Inventek Investment Group, we believe that technology can revolutionize how traders and investors operate in financial markets. Our vision is to provide everyone with intelligent, reliable, and user-friendly trading bots that execute trades with precision, efficiency, and discipline. We strive to empower investors of all skill levels to make informed decisions and achieve their financial goals through automated trading, thus increasing consistency and profitability.

WHO_WE_ARE.TITLE: Who We Are
WHO_WE_ARE.DESCRIPTION: Our passion for software development and financial markets drives our team of professionals. We combine this devotion with extensive industry knowledge, rigorous research, and discipline to create top-notch financial products and services that help clients invest easier and wiser while reducing risk and gaining consistency. With years of experience and a profound understanding of the markets, we help simplify the complexities, thus allowing investors and traders to reach their financial goals.

OUR_VISION.TITLE: Our Vision
OUR_VISION.DESCRIPTION: At Inventek Investment Group, we believe that technology can revolutionize how traders and investors operate in financial markets. Our vision is to provide everyone with intelligent, reliable, and user-friendly trading bots that execute trades with precision, efficiency, and discipline. We strive to empower investors of all skill levels to make informed decisions and achieve their financial goals through automated trading, thus increasing consistency and profitability.

PHILOSOPHY.TITLE: Investment Philosophy
PHILOSOPHY.DESCRIPTION: Our investment philosophy centers around value-driven trades that use a combination of technical and fundamental analysis governed by thorough research, algorithmic analysis, and prudent risk management. Our trading bots are designed to leverage technology to obtain an edge that generates consistent, superior investment performance over the long term. Each software product is backtested to ensure performance over many years and includes all market conditions. Additionally, they are forward-tested to ensure consistency with historical results.

WHY_CHOOSE_US.TITLE: Why Choose Us?
WHY_CHOOSE_US.EXPERTISE: Expertise and Experience: Our team comprises highly skilled professionals with diverse finance, software development, and portfolio management backgrounds. We bring a wealth of experience and knowledge to our algorithmic trading strategies, enabling us to navigate various market conditions and identify promising investment opportunities.
WHY_CHOOSE_US.TAILORED: Tailored Investment Solutions: We understand that each investor has unique financial objectives, risk tolerance, and time horizons. We take a personalized approach to investment management, recommending specific trading bots that align with your specific goals and circumstances. Our solutions are designed to grow and preserve your wealth effectively.
WHY_CHOOSE_US.RIGOROUS: Rigorous Research and Due Diligence: Our algorithm development process is driven by extensive research and thorough due diligence. We design our software to review multiple conditions and seek confluence before placing trades. Our meticulous research-driven approach to bot development helps us identify attractive entry and exit points while managing risk effectively.
WHY_CHOOSE_US.DIVERSIFICATION: Diversification: We believe in the power of diversification to reduce risk and enhance returns. Our products are carefully constructed to provide exposure to a diversified range of asset classes, sectors, and geographies. This diversification helps mitigate the impact of market volatility and ensures a balanced portfolio.
WHY_CHOOSE_US.TRANSPARENCY: Transparency and Accountability: We prioritize transparency and maintain open lines of communication with our clients. You can expect regular reporting, updates on portfolio performance, a monthly newsletter, and a clear understanding of your investments. We take responsibility seriously and always act in your best interests.
WHY_CHOOSE_US.EXCEPTIONAL: Exceptional Client Service: Your satisfaction and success are at the heart of everything we do. Our dedicated client service team is always available to address your inquiries, provide guidance, and offer personalized support. We aim to build long-term relationships with our clients based on trust, integrity, and mutual respect.
WHY_CHOOSE_US.TAKE_THE_FIRST_STEPS: Take the first step towards a secure financial future. Contact us today to explore how our investment bots can help you achieve your goals and unlock your potential. Let us be your trusted partner on the path to financial success.

DESCRIPTION.PARRAGRAPH1: At Inventek Investments Group, Inc., we recognize that technology is revolutionizing every industry, and agriculture is no exception. The increasing demand for efficiency, sustainability, and profitability has driven us to diversify our portfolio with AgTech (Agricultural Technology) solutions, integrating Artificial Intelligence, IoT, Blockchain, Automation, and Robotics to transform agricultural and livestock production.
DESCRIPTION.PARRAGRAPH2: Our focus is on leveraging cutting-edge technology to enhance yields, reduce operational costs, and optimize decision-making, creating a positive impact for both investors and the agricultural sector.

ACCORDION.TITLE: Strategic Areas of Investment in Agricultural Technology

ITEM1.TITLE: Precision Agriculture with IoT and Drones

How_it_works?.TITLE: How it works?
How_it_works?.DESCRIPTION: Using IoT sensors, satellite imagery, and drones equipped with multispectral cameras, we provide real-time analysis of crop health, soil quality, and irrigation needs.

Use_Cases:.TITLE: Use Cases:
Use_Cases:.LIST2: Remote monitoring of large agricultural areas
Use_Cases:.LIST3: Early detection of pests and diseases

Investment_Opportunity:.TITLE: Investment Opportunity:
Investment_Opportunity:.DESCRIPTION: Development of data analysis software for agriculture and commercialization of drone monitoring services.

ITEM2.TITLE: Livestock Management and Traceability with RFID

How_it_works?.TITLE: How it works?
How_it_works?.DESCRIPTION: Through RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) devices and smart sensors, each animal is assigned a unique code, enabling real-time tracking of its diet, health, and location.

Use_Cases:.TITLE: Use Cases:
Use_Cases:.LIST1: Monitoring livestock health and vaccination schedules
Use_Cases:.LIST2: Optimizing feeding strategies to maximize meat and milk production
Use_Cases:.LIST3: Reducing losses and theft through geolocation

Investment_Opportunity:.TITLE: Investment Opportunity:
Investment_Opportunity:.DESCRIPTION: Implementation of data-driven livestock management platforms with subscription models or hardware and software sales.

How_it_works?.TITLE: How it works?
How_it_works?.DESCRIPTION: Advances in artificial intelligence enable the use of autonomous robots for planting, fertilizing, and harvesting, reducing labor dependency and improving efficiency in every process.

Use_Cases:.TITLE: Use Cases:
Use_Cases:.LIST1: Vision-guided fruit and vegetable harvesting robots
Use_Cases:.LIST2: Automated seed planting machines with depth and density adjustment
Use_Cases:.LIST3: Autonomous weed control equipment without pesticides

Investment_Opportunity:.TITLE: Investment Opportunity:
Investment_Opportunity:.DESCRIPTION: Development and commercialization of precision agricultural mechanization technology.

How_it_works?.TITLE: How it works?
How_it_works?.DESCRIPTION: Using hydroponic and vertical farming systems with optimized LED lighting, food can be produced in compact spaces without the need for agricultural land.

Use_Cases:.TITLE: Use Cases:
Use_Cases:.LIST1: Pesticide-free food production in urban environments
Use_Cases:.LIST2: Optimized plant growth using humidity and nutrient sensors
Use_Cases:.LIST3: 90% water savings compared to traditional farming

Investment_Opportunity:.TITLE: Investment Opportunity:
Investment_Opportunity:.DESCRIPTION: Development of modular vertical farms and automated control technologies.

ITEM5.TITLE: Blockchain for Agricultural Traceability and Trade

How_it_works?.TITLE: How it works?
How_it_works?.DESCRIPTION: Blockchain technology creates an immutable record that certifies the origin, quality, and logistics journey of each agricultural product, ensuring transparency and trust in the supply chain.

Use_Cases:.TITLE: Use Cases:
Use_Cases:.LIST1: Digital certification for premium exports like coffee and cocoa
Use_Cases:.LIST2: Reducing intermediaries and enabling direct sales to international markets
Use_Cases:.LIST3: Smart contracts for streamlining agricultural trade payments

Investment_Opportunity:.TITLE: Investment Opportunity:
Investment_Opportunity:.DESCRIPTION: Development of traceability platforms for producers, distributors, and international markets.

ITEM6.TITLE: Agricultural Fintech: Smart Financing and Insurance

How_it_works?.TITLE: How it works?
How_it_works?.DESCRIPTION: Fintech platforms applied to agriculture provide data-driven loans and insurance to farmers, reducing risks and facilitating access to financing.

Use_Cases:.TITLE: Use Cases:
Use_Cases:.LIST1: Agricultural loans evaluated using climate and productivity data
Use_Cases:.LIST2: Smart insurance policies that adjust coverage based on real-time climate events
Use_Cases:.LIST3: Tokenization of agricultural assets for investment and crowdfunding

Investment_Opportunity:.TITLE: Investment Opportunity:
Investment_Opportunity:.DESCRIPTION: Development of credit and smart insurance platforms with scalable models.

JOIN_AGTECH.TITLE: Join the AgTech Transformation with Inventek Investments
JOIN_AGTECH.DESCRIPTION: The agricultural revolution is underway, and at Inventek Investments Group, Inc., we are leading the change with strategic investments in technology. Our mission is to connect capital with innovation, transforming agriculture into a more productive, efficient, and sustainable sector.
JOIN_AGTECH.MESSAGE: If you are interested in investing in the future of agriculture, contact us to explore the available opportunities.

INBOT_HAWK.TITLE: INBOT HAWK
INBOT_HAWK.DESCRIPTION: The Hawk uses VWAP and other indicators to detect a momentum shift in the market. The product is optimized for Tesla, Apple, Microsoft, and Amazon and uses hard stops and take profits to ensure proper risk management.

INBOT_NTZ.TITLE: INBOT NTZ
INBOT_NTZ.DESCRIPTION: The Hawk uses VWAP and other indicators to detect a This is an automated strategy that uses Money Flow to detect market direction. Once money flow shifts in the opposite direction, the contract is closed, and an opposing contract is opened. The bot operates in the NinjaTrader version 8 and is optimized for Nasdaq (MNQ) and S&P 500 (MES) futures contracts.

INBOT_KSSL.TITLE: INBOT KSSL
INBOT_KSSL.DESCRIPTION: This bot uses a continuation strategy that combines Kijun and SSL, along with other indicators, to take advantage of developing a new trend. The bot operates in the NinjaTrader version 8 and is optimized for Nasdaq (MNQ) and S&P 500 (MES) futures contracts.

INBOT_SRSI.TITLE: INBOT SRSI
INBOT_SRSI.DESCRIPTION: The automated trading system uses Stochastics, RSI, and other momentum and direction indicators to detect market conditions. The bot uses a continuation strategy. Inbot SRSI operates in the NinjaTrader platform version 8 and is optimized for Nasdaq (MNQ) futures contracts.

INBOT_BBBREAK.TITLE: INBOT BBBREAK
INBOT_BBBREAK.DESCRIPTION: The automated trading system uses Bollinger Bands to determine market sentiment to enter trades. Inbot BBBreak uses a flat market and opens a position based on a momentum movement.

INBOT_30BOTS.TITLE: 30+ BOTS
INBOT_30BOTS.DESCRIPTION: We have a collection of over 38 bots that operate in futures, stocks, options, commodities, and forex. The idea of each is to diversify any portfolio and manage risk properly.

INBOT_IZY.TITLE: INBOT IZY
INBOT_IZY.DESCRIPTION: InbotIZY is an advanced trading bot designed for MetaTrader 5, optimized for trading the EUR/USD pair on a 1-hour timeframe. The bot utilizes multiple entry signals, combining a variety of indicators and proprietary strategies to maximize trading opportunities. Each trade is managed with a robust risk management system, including a customizable stop loss, profit target, and trailing stop option for dynamic trade adjustments. InbotIZY is designed to be compatible with funded accounts, incorporating an optional maximum daily loss limit and a track record of maintaining a maximum drawdown below the 10% threshold commonly required by these firms. Additionally, the bot automatically closes all positions on Fridays to prevent weekend risk, ensuring a disciplined approach to trading.

INBOT_NTZ.TITLE: INBOT NTZ
INBOT_NTZ.DESCRIPTION: InbotNTZ is a sophisticated trading bot designed for NinjaTrader 8, optimized for trading MNQ (Nasdaq futures) on a 15-minute chart. The bot uses a combination of proprietary algorithms and standard technical indicators to accurately identify market trends and trading opportunities. When a buy or sell signal is generated, the algorithm ensures that the signal is aligned with the overall market trend before executing a trade. Each trade is protected with customizable stop-loss and take-profit settings, offering a balanced risk-reward ratio. Additionally, users can enable a trailing stop feature for dynamic trade management, with flexible customization of parameters to tailor the strategy to individual preferences.

INBOT_SCALPER.TITLE: INBOT SCALPER
INBOT_SCALPER.DESCRIPTION: InbotScalper is a high-performance trading bot designed for MetaTrader 4, optimized specifically for the EUR/USD pair on a 5-minute chart. This bot is ideal for traders looking for aggressive growth, using a grid trading strategy to average out entry costs and maximize profit potential. Despite its aggressive approach, InbotScalper has a solid track record of account preservation, never burning an account. It offers robust risk management features, including an optional maximum loss percentage, trailing stop, and customizable stop loss and take profit settings. InbotScalper combines powerful strategies with advanced risk controls, making it an attractive option for traders looking to balance high returns with disciplined trading.

BANNER_FOOTER: Technology is a tool. Any successful implementation requires an alignment between people, knowledge and process. Trading robots are no different.

FOOTER.ACCEPT_TERMS: I accept the terms and conditions.
